timeline.bodyText: Added utility that will need for other tickets also.

timeline.bodyText: Changed to null so we can tell difference between "doesn't use gender" and "no info available"

timeline.bodyText: This is slightly different than the ticket; cause an error but note to users that they can use gendered variants, eg feminine of 'cubic'

timeline.message: CLDR-13900 Fix data problems causing errors with the new test.
